Title: Palefire's Secret 1
Content: Often driven to take apart and study the things he likes.

Title: Palefire's Secret 2
Content: He relaxes by quickly disassembling heavy firearms.

Title: Palefire's Secret 3
Content: He is a good tailor.

Title: Palefire's Secret 4
Content: He has studied the styles and forms of human formal wear.

Title: Palefire's Secret 5
Content: Has mixed thoughts about being called "Brother".

Title: Palefire's Secret 6
Content: His radar performance is second only to Liv, but he has no sense of direction.

Title: Palefire's Secret 7
Content: Interested in human electronic entertainment, but gave it up after hearing that Kamui likes it.

Title: Palefire's Secret 8
Content: Considers his own assembly and disassembly style academic, and Nanami's style chaotic.

Title: Palefire's Secret 9
Content: Sometimes adds useless features to weapons, such as can openers.

Title: Palefire's Secret 10
Content: But has never shown these new features to anyone.

Title: Palefire's Secret 11
Content: Through precise calculations, the possibility of Lee stylishly juggling a gun in the air and failing to catch it is 0.372%.

Title: Palefire's Secret 12
Content: Has a habit of digitizing important matters.

Title: Lotus' Secret 1
Content: Has many identical red scarves.

Title: Lotus' Secret 2
Content: Tried to make lunch for the commandant. Blew up the kitchen.

Title: Lotus' Secret 3
Content: When wielding dual blades, her body temperature goes up in a similar way to how humans have fevers.

Title: Lotus' Secret 4
Content: Her hair is made from composite fibers and cannot be cut by common blades.

Title: Lotus' Secret 5
Content: She has somewhat unique aesthetic tastes.

Title: Lotus' Secret 6
Content: When she is quiet outside of a mission, she is not thinking, just daydreaming.

Title: Lotus' Secret 7
Content: Strangely respectful of older Constructs, such as Bianca and Watanabe.

Title: Lotus' Secret 8
Content: Sees great potential in Liv.

Title: Lotus' Secret 9
Content: Does not understand what Nanami is thinking.

Title: Lotus' Secret 10
Content: Has trouble with Karenina's passionate approach.

Title: Lotus' Secret 11
Content: Would like to try iai, or quick draw, techniques, but the lack of a sheath prevents her from doing so.

Title: Lotus' Secret 12
Content: Wary about every little movement of the commandant.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 1
Content: Does not like being taken care of.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 2
Content: Has heard of Lucia before joining Gray Raven, and holds her in high regard.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 3
Content: Knows that Lee is prone to getting lost when on his own.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 4
Content: Pins special targets found on radar with cute names.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 5
Content: The heavy outfit is in imitation of Lucia's style.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 6
Content: Has spent two hours watching Lee lose his way on radar, finally heaving a sigh of relief when Lee found his way back on the right path.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 7
Content: Constantly successful at obtaining concessions when negotiating with other teams.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 8
Content: Her maintenance pod is to the left of Lucia's.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 9
Content: Thought her Inver-Device was too noticeable, but changed her mind after Lucia praised its defensive uses.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 10
Content: Her levitators would sometimes plummet from losing speed. Liv would quietly pick them up by herself.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 11
Content: Asks Lee and Lucia for advice on other weapon usages occasionally. Has once suggested a combat style with combination moves of gun and sword.

Title: Eclipse's Secret 12
Content: Monitors the commandant's three meals and cares about the nutritional balance a lot.

Title: Zero's Secret 1
Content: Her hat is tied with a hidden band and does not fall off in battle.

Title: Zero's Secret 2
Content: Karenina makes her hair.

Title: Zero's Secret 3
Content: Feels that her chest cushion is too thick, especially compared to Karenina's.

Title: Zero's Secret 4
Content: Tends to lose focus from her chest button being undone.

Title: Zero's Secret 5
Content: Sometimes slips when landing from certain height.

Title: Zero's Secret 6
Content: The pattern of her socks reflects the cultured taste of the designer of her frame.

Title: Zero's Secret 7
Content: Makes the sign of the cross to pray before battle.

Title: Zero's Secret 8
Content: Has a devastating kick attack that she is reluctant to use.

Title: Zero's Secret 9
Content: Has ranked at the top of the "Female Construct that you want to date the most" list.

Title: Zero's Secret 10
Content: She is unaware of the list, however.

Title: Zero's Secret 11
Content: Rarely works with other commandants. The commandant of Gray Raven is an exception.

Title: Zero's Secret 12
Content: In battle, will consciously avoid the vitals when first aiming at enemies.

Title: Storm's Secret 1
Content: The special materials used to build her makes her heavier than other Constructs despite her small size.

Title: Storm's Secret 2
Content: Has the smoothest hair among Constructs.

Title: Storm's Secret 3
Content: Frequently claims to have encountered strange things.

Title: Storm's Secret 4
Content: Has scanned Watanabe's bar code. Has not told anyone about the result.

Title: Storm's Secret 5
Content: Has traveled around the world.

Title: Storm's Secret 6
Content: Knows more about Constructs than even Lee.

Title: Storm's Secret 7
Content: Hates nothing more than boredom.

Title: Storm's Secret 8
Content: Why chainsaw? #1: It looks devastating.

Title: Storm's Secret 9
Content: Why chainsaw? #2: It sounds rad.

Title: Storm's Secret 10
Content: Why chainsaw? #3: Enemies seem to be in mortal pain when they get cut.

Title: Storm's Secret 11
Content: A strange transceiver is installed within her skirt. She sometimes acts like a spy with it.

Title: Storm's Secret 12
Content: Loves setting up dominoes or toy blocks, then toppling them.

Title: Bastion's Secret 1
Content: Door frames hate his horn.

Title: Bastion's Secret 2
Content: Feels like he needs to put on a little more weight to be steady on his feet when swinging his big, bulky, sword.

Title: Bastion's Secret 3
Content: Likes the term "girl friend".

Title: Bastion's Secret 4
Content: Good at video games, especially match-3 puzzles.

Title: Bastion's Secret 5
Content: Wanted video gaming functions installed into his frame, but gave it up after being informed that the monitor could only be placed on his belly.

Title: Bastion's Secret 6
Content: Thinks that the Gray Raven commandant is interesting.

Title: Bastion's Secret 7
Content: Felt that Lucia looked familiar the first time he saw her, but did not tell her that because it would look like he was hitting on her.

Title: Bastion's Secret 8
Content: The Strike Hawk squad members are not a tight-knit group, so Kamui often has to play the messenger to bring people together.

Title: Bastion's Secret 9
Content: Wants to have an Inver-Device like Chrome's that won't keep hitting and breaking things so easily.

Title: Bastion's Secret 10
Content: Has destroyed a Corrupted's logic circuit with an Inver-Device.

Title: Bastion's Secret 11
Content: Is actually capable of dual-wielding greatswords. Chrome denied it for being too absurd.

Title: Bastion's Secret 12
Content: When playing games with Gray Raven's commandant, Kamui will occasionally concede for unknown reasons.

Title: Blast's Secret 1
Content: Certified Cosmos Industries building demolisher.

Title: Blast's Secret 2
Content: Goes crazy if she hears Lucia's name.

Title: Blast's Secret 3
Content: After she is done being angry, words of praise are what she wants to hear the most.

Title: Blast's Secret 4
Content: Surprisingly open to reason, especially if it comes from Bianca.

Title: Blast's Secret 5
Content: Does things Karenina-style for happenings not covered by her orders.

Title: Blast's Secret 6
Content:
Karenina in 3:
Act 1. "LUCIA!" (Shouts)
Act 2. "LUCIA!!!" (Attacks)
Act 3. "LUCIA!!!!!" (Lucia parries, Karenina gets mad)

Title: Blast's Secret 7
Content: Knows about Nanami's strength, and looks forward to fighting with her someday.

Title: Blast's Secret 8
Content: Does not like it when the commandant interferes in battle.

Title: Blast's Secret 9
Content: Likes big Inver-Devices because they look powerful.

Title: Blast's Secret 10
Content: Which is why she made a hood that can hold large Inver-Devices.

Title: Blast's Secret 11
Content: Will use her horns to poke the commandant when she is angry.

Title: Blast's Secret 12
Content: Has tried firing a plethora of objects in her cannon. Even certain people...

Title: Nightblade's Secret 1
Content: There was a time when he would tirelessly tell anyone he came across that he is not old, not their pops, nor an ol' geezer.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 2
Content: Likes cats, but has never told anyone about it.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 3
Content: His heterochromia is a result of a manufacturing defect.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 4
Content: Regularly tests the limits of his frame.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 5
Content: Often loses his hairband.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 6
Content: Knows how to make human food. Has commonly taken shifts at the Forsaken HQ's kitchen.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 7
Content: When discussing family with Forsaken humans, Liv is the first thing that comes to his mind when the word "daughter" comes up.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 8
Content: Feels that it would be a headache to have a daughter like Nanami. Not that he is in a position to have children.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 9
Content: Good at recycling resources. Able to recite the price of most things on the open market.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 10
Content: Apparently has his own apron and oven mitt.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 11
Content: Will leave marks on his room to record time.

Title: Nightblade's Secret 12
Content: For the entertainment and spiritual needs of the Forsaken, Watanabe has uploaded audio files of his performance in the Forsaken HQ before.

Title: Dawn's Secret 1
Content: Has complained about her hairstyle.

Title: Dawn's Secret 2
Content: Her weapon can be hidden in her left arm.

Title: Dawn's Secret 3
Content: The floating weapons that appear in burst mode are 3D printed on the spot.

Title: Dawn's Secret 4
Content: Energy consumption is twice that of the Lotus model.

Title: Dawn's Secret 5
Content: Despite being an early model, its maintenance is the highest among the three.

Title: Dawn's Secret 6
Content: Sometimes has thoughts about changing up the style of the Inver-Device a little.

Title: Dawn's Secret 7
Content: Treats Liv as her own sister because of a familiar feeling that Liv gives her.

Title: Dawn's Secret 8
Content: Did extensive research on frogs to understand why she likes frog plushies, and ended up liking frog plushies even more.

Title: Dawn's Secret 9
Content: Has looked at her own reflection on her blade.

Title: Dawn's Secret 10
Content: Believes that everything the Commandant says is right and has a deeper meaning behind it.

Title: Dawn's Secret 11
Content: Can actually stay temporarily airborne through the levitational capabilities of her blades.

Title: Dawn's Secret 12
Content: Has once stormed through an entire war zone area while carrying the commandant.

Title: Lux's Secret 1
Content: Sometimes practices cool-looking shooting poses while holding a levitator.

Title: Lux's Secret 2
Content: The hand-waving motion when attacking is purely cosmetic.

Title: Lux's Secret 3
Content: Wants to know how it feels to eat.

Title: Lux's Secret 4
Content: Sometimes feels that Lee is more childish than her.

Title: Lux's Secret 5
Content: Quietly turns on sound-cancelling when Kamui is making a ruckus.

Title: Lux's Secret 6
Content: The levitator is equipped with a supplemental camera and sensors.

Title: Lux's Secret 7
Content: Responsible for the team's logistics management and provision reports.

Title: Lux's Secret 8
Content: Aimed her Levi-Gun once at Karenina when Karenina tried to provoke Lucia.

Title: Lux's Secret 9
Content: Admires Watanabe's mature attitude.

Title: Lux's Secret 10
Content: Sometimes wishes she could stand alongside Lucia on the frontlines.

Title: Lux's Secret 11
Content: The signal orb skills of this frame were named by Liv herself.

Title: Lux's Secret 12
Content: Believes that the fewer the coating and equipment, the more mobile she is. To Liv, Lux is a frame for speed and rough terrain.

Title: Ember's Secret 1
Content: Does not get along with the other members of the Purifying Force.

Title: Ember's Secret 2
Content: This new frame is much better at jumping than her last.

Title: Ember's Secret 3
Content: Bianca's lap is her best pillow.

Title: Ember's Secret 4
Content: Likes to make Bianca's hair.

Title: Ember's Secret 5
Content: Is happy to be assigned to the Purifying Force.

Title: Ember's Secret 6
Content: What Karenina expresses the most annoyance for on the surface is likely something she truly likes.

Title: Ember's Secret 7
Content: Spun around in circles once after she switched into a new frame.

Title: Ember's Secret 8
Content: Bianca saw her spinning.

Title: Ember's Secret 9
Content: Her weapon will hurt even herself if its full power is unleashed.

Title: Ember's Secret 10
Content: There are 32 holes in the ground in front of Gray Raven HQ, all made by Karenina. There will be a new one any day now.

Title: Ember's Secret 11
Content: Has once stepped on one of the accessories on her own frame and tripped. She still likes this frame, though.

Title: Ember's Secret 12
Content: Has once checked the whereabouts of the Gray Raven squad through the Purifying Force positioning system.

Title: Luminance's Secret 1
Content: Many Constructs have professed their love for her.

Title: Luminance's Secret 2
Content: Sometimes loses her sense of direction when floating in battle.

Title: Luminance's Secret 3
Content: Unconsciously swishes her hair around sometimes as if it were still long.

Title: Luminance's Secret 4
Content: Has searched for information and explanations on human families.

Title: Luminance's Secret 5
Content: Has said that Luminance is her favorite loadout.

Title: Luminance's Secret 6
Content: Will quietly clean up the mess that others make in HQ.

Title: Luminance's Secret 7
Content: Has gotten uneasy about talking with members from other squads after her frame change.

Title: Luminance's Secret 8
Content: Adjusted her maintenance pod to help her get used to her new frame.

Title: Luminance's Secret 9
Content: Likes to take care of plants.

Title: Luminance's Secret 10
Content: Has imagined about her life after the war.

Title: Luminance's Secret 11
Content: Celica forces her to yell her skill names out sometimes.

Title: Luminance's Secret 12
Content: Feels embarrassed about walking beside the commandant in this frame.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 1
Content: Once jumped into a pond to catch fish.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 2
Content: Somewhat concerned about his own change.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 3
Content: Considers Lee and the commandant to be close comrades.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 4
Content: Has a knack for getting on Lee's nerves.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 5
Content: Likes anything that starts with "Every"... like "Everyone".

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 6
Content: Cares a lot for his comrades.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 7
Content: Very bad at lying. He shows obvious fluctuations in his M.I.N.D. when he lies.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 8
Content: Has wondered who he really is—Kamui or Camu?

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 9
Content: Reaction with Tenebrion has changed his vital fluid color.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 10
Content: Suspected that his memory module might be damaged, but soon forgot about the matter.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 11
Content: Will stab his greatsword into the ground and lean on it when resting.

Title: Tenebrion's Secret 12
Content: Lost a bet with Wanshi and had to give up his maintenance capsule usage rights for a while. Used the Gray Raven's spare maintenance capsules in their HQ during so.

Title: Entropy's Secret 1
Content: Very conscious of numbers.

Title: Entropy's Secret 2
Content: Claims that there is a problem with the heat circulation system, but never got it fixed.

Title: Entropy's Secret 3
Content: Has a 50% win rate in verbal spats with Kamui.

Title: Entropy's Secret 4
Content: Likes the color blue, which is also the color of his vital fluid.

Title: Entropy's Secret 5
Content: His hair is stiffer than the other Constructs'.

Title: Entropy's Secret 6
Content: Has had more human females than Construct females ask him for his number, but he has turned down every request.

Title: Entropy's Secret 7
Content: Understands more about the internal workings of things than their external appearance.

Title: Entropy's Secret 8
Content: Has had objective and logical discourses on the functionality of various Construct parts with the commandant—including Bianca's chest cushion.

Title: Entropy's Secret 9
Content: Has studied Kamui's vocal module and tried to shut it off.

Title: Entropy's Secret 10
Content: Developed a mini Inver-Device for his botlets.

Title: Entropy's Secret 11
Content: After a certain incident, Kamui and a few others tried to "trap" Lee, but his intellect saved him from an untimely demise.

Title: Entropy's Secret 12
Content: After acquiring the commandant's consent, Lee has digitized and archived data obtained through commandant observation.

Title: Pulse's Secret 1
Content: Able to perform a perfect three-and-a-half axel.

Title: Pulse's Secret 2
Content: Her digital diary holds the secrets of the world.

Title: Pulse's Secret 3
Content: Her Corrupted friends recorded and numbered in her digital diary are in the triple digits.

Title: Pulse's Secret 4
Content: However, the friend numbers are not assigned in order.

Title: Pulse's Secret 5
Content: Able to run on walls with her propulsion wheels.

Title: Pulse's Secret 6
Content: As good with her hands as Lee is.

Title: Pulse's Secret 7
Content: Her favorite human festival is Halloween.

Title: Pulse's Secret 8
Content: Thinks that older Constructs suffer from hair loss. Once tried to pull Watanabe's hair to confirm her theory.

Title: Pulse's Secret 9
Content: Curious about the concept of dating.

Title: Pulse's Secret 10
Content: Has thought about kidnapping the commandant.

Title: Pulse's Secret 11
Content: She screams the name of her moves to warn the enemies.

Title: Pulse's Secret 12
Content: Once rallied up to a hundred mechanoids as her soldiers for LARPing, screaming and demanding for Babylonia to hand her the Gray Raven Commandant. This incident was classified as a Level 2 Hazard by Babylonia's mission assignment system.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 1
Content: Wants to travel around the world to see the sights.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 2
Content: Likes to collect powerful pets and challenge powerful opponents.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 3
Content: Some patches on her jacket are cosmetic.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 4
Content: Obsessed with modifying motorcycles.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 5
Content: The way she ties her shoes changes with her mood.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 6
Content: Likes to read standing up.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 7
Content: Does not want people to see her left eye.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 8
Content: Has some fishing bait in her belt pocket.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 9
Content: Luna is the only one that is allowed to maintain her frame.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 10
Content: Quieter than she used to be, but she smiles more now.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 11
Content: Cares about the Gray Raven squad's movements.

Title: Crimson Abyss' Secret 12
Content: Likes standing in tall places.

Title: Astral's Secret 1
Content: Watanabe can assess Babylonia from an objective perspective, but when it comes to a personal one...

Title: Astral's Secret 2
Content: He regards the commandant of Gray Raven as the only person from Babylonia he can communicate with.

Title: Astral's Secret 3
Content: Bianca ranks No.1 among the Constructs he is bad at handling. Nanami is a close 2nd, and even overtakes Bianca sometimes.

Title: Astral's Secret 4
Content: Will put on a coat sometimes because he is feeling phantom chills.

Title: Astral's Secret 5
Content: He is skilled at price negotiation.

Title: Astral's Secret 6
Content: There are many spare hair ties in his waist bag.

Title: Astral's Secret 7
Content: Has once cut food with his hand-blades, and he cut through it perfectly.

Title: Astral's Secret 8
Content: This frame can be customized to store different items, including but not limited to shoulder-fired weapons and cooking utensils.

Title: Astral's Secret 9
Content: He believes it is unfair to use this frame against Bianca. But no one knows how such a fight would turn out.

Title: Astral's Secret 10
Content: The frame is equipped with a sound suppressor and stealth technology, enabling him to sneak into the commandant's room at midnight without being noticed.

Title: Astral's Secret 11
Content: Tried cultivating different plants in the desert.

Title: Astral's Secret 12
Content: The Gray Raven Commandant has seen him playing a guitar.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 1
Content: Closely followed Gray Raven news from the very beginning.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 2
Content: The beret is an additional piece of equipment requested by Ayla. There are a total of 103 styles available for her selection.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 3
Content: Believes that the scythe, as a weapon, can be an instrument of art. Wielding a scythe compels her to create pieces of work that match the weapon.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 4
Content: All open books for Ayla. She is good at seeing through people's minds.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 5
Content: She has a sizable fan club in Babylonia.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 6
Content: A painting of hers was once purchased by an anonymous person with a surprising amount of Black Card credits.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 7
Content: This frame has the highest cost compared with the frames from the same batch. It was fully paid for by Ayla alone.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 8
Content: She will give female Constructs hugs as warm welcomes.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 9
Content: She painted a portrait of the commandant of Gray Raven. She treasures it greatly.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 10
Content: She has built an incredibly extensive social network in Babylonia.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 11
Content: Owns a massive number of coatings, but some of them are forbidden in public.

Title: Brilliance's Secret 12
Content: Uses a bespectacled frame to match serious work time.

Title: Veritas' Secret 1
Content: Asimov is now in charge of the upgrade and maintenance works for this frame.

Title: Veritas' Secret 2
Content: Once supplied power for the public facilities of Babylonia during a power outage.

Title: Veritas' Secret 3
Content: The vision module is powerful enough to enable Bianca to see a minuscule scratch on Karenina's arm from 3 kilometers away.

Title: Veritas' Secret 4
Content: Her luck works in unfathomable ways, always leading to fateful results.

Title: Veritas' Secret 5
Content: For the sake of impartiality, the Purifying Force has established a random selection system for hit targets. Members would randomly draw targets from the mission vault. Bianca drew Watanabe.

Title: Veritas' Secret 6
Content: The training program of Daedalus includes eastern calligraphy. The character on this frame was written by Bianca herself.

Title: Veritas' Secret 7
Content: She will meticulously study the plot development and underlying themes of any literary works, including corny romance novels.

Title: Veritas' Secret 8
Content: She is often moved by corny romance.

Title: Veritas' Secret 9
Content: Either on her way to a mission, or already on a mission.

Title: Veritas' Secret 10
Content: Commandant presence can help stabilize her M.I.N.D. when she is using this frame.

Title: Veritas' Secret 11
Content: Once shot at the sun at her highest power output because Karenina wanted to see her do so.

Title: Veritas' Secret 12
Content: Keeps the one-day date related items and records somewhere safe.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 1
Content: She walks soundlessly and is good at climbing and leaping.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 2
Content: Her favorite game is hide-and-seek, and finds joy in being found.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 3
Content: In addition to her moniker of "Hyena", Changyu has once called her "Kowloong Mew Mew".

Title: Silverfang's Secret 4
Content: The robotic arms are multi-functional and can carry out precise maneuvers, able to even thread needles.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 5
Content: For a length of time after joining Gray Raven, she was tasked with fixing up facilities damaged by Karenina.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 6
Content: Spends a lot of time discussing mechanical engineering with Lee.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 7
Content: Sophia's name is not given by her parents, but she adores it greatly.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 8
Content: When she first learned how to write, she had to keep crossing out and rewriting words in her letters. Few could recognize her doodles.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 9
Content: Spends whole nights remotely chatting with Jamilah, though it is mostly Jamilah that is doing the talking.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 10
Content: Tried to find an answer to who she would save if Jamilah and the commandant fell off the train at the same time. It overloaded her brain.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 11
Content: Likes rolling around in fluffy beds.

Title: Silverfang's Secret 12
Content: After becoming friends with Nanami, they created the Little League.

Title: Arclight's Secret 1
Content: Proficient in all weapons.

Title: Arclight's Secret 2
Content: Prefers to use a scythe in Strike Hawk missions so he can hook his teammates back.

Title: Arclight's Secret 3
Content: Has taken over all cleaning and tidying duties in the Strike Hawk HQ.

Title: Arclight's Secret 3
Content: Takes other people's words very seriously and easily gets conned.

Title: Arclight's Secret 5
Content: Has many experimental high-tech devices installed in his frame.

Title: Arclight's Secret 6
Content: Never lost in 1-on-1 duels between Strike Hawk members. Only one male member was ever able to score a draw.

Title: Arclight's Secret 7
Content: Always thinks about how to take it easy in practice, but can't help but get serious again once the practice starts.

Title: Arclight's Secret 8
Content: Always busy picking up the pieces left by his teammates.

Title: Arclight's Secret 9
Content: Often has his hand on the communicator, but he is not really engaged in a conversation most of the time. Instead, he is just thinking about the next step. His hand is there so he can immediately give orders once he has reached a conclusion.

Title: Arclight's Secret 10
Content: Cares about his appearance a lot. Spends a long time doing his hair. Even helps his teammates with their looks. Made many pockets on Kamui's clothes to help him stop losing things.

Title: Arclight's Secret 11
Content: For teambuilding reasons, has hosted a pajama party under Wanshi's suggestion.

Title: Arclight's Secret 12
Content: Unconsciously straightened the collar of the Gray Raven Commandant once. Realized that it might be too much of an encroachment afterward and prepared an apology gift to sincerely ask for forgiveness.

Title: Plume's Secret 1
Content: Has started to collect scarves of colors other than red — the other team members' theme colors, to be precise.

Title: Plume's Secret 2
Content: Her frame quickly cools down when she uses her twin blades.

Title: Plume's Secret 3
Content: Sometimes appears in front of people in a different hair style. The twin-tails are one of her favorite at the moment.

Title: Plume's Secret 4
Content: Undertook some high-speed sprint training using her "Feather" thruster at the back, but fell over due to charging too much power.

Title: Plume's Secret 5
Content: Once considered whether she should apply to change the shape of her thruster to wing-like, but decided to keep it as it was.

Title: Plume's Secret 6
Content: The size of her frog plushies keeps getting bigger.

Title: Plume's Secret 7
Content: The food she cooked had perfect presentation and fragrance. Many non-Gray Raven colleagues fell for it.

Title: Plume's Secret 8
Content: She seems to be lost in her own thoughts more often than ever. But unlike before, she now gives a reassuring smile.

Title: Plume's Secret 9
Content: The emotion module of her new frame has been configured by some unknown authorized personnel. It cannot be turned off now.

Title: Plume's Secret 10
Content: When she lost all the memory data inevitably, the part related to Commandant was the last one to be forgotten.

Title: Plume's Secret 11
Content: Would stand guard outside of the commandant's room from time to time.

Title: Plume's Secret 12
Content: Knows that everyone is treating her the same like she was before and is grateful for that.

Title: Rozen's Secret 1
Content: Smiles when she feels pain.

Title: Rozen's Secret 2
Content: Had trouble recognizing faces when she was still a human. Had a habit of coming up with nicknames for people and things.

Title: Rozen's Secret 3
Content: Often misunderstood by people. The misunderstanding almost always takes a turn for the worse. Stopped bothering to explain herself eventually.

Title: Rozen's Secret 4
Content: Once returned from a mission walking back with a bionic dog.

Title: Rozen's Secret 5
Content: Hard to discern what she dislikes or likes. The difference in her expression is subtle and nigh-unnoticeable.

Title: Rozen's Secret 6
Content: Thinks the Construct-use electrolytic sim-liquor tastes like complete dog water.

Title: Rozen's Secret 7
Content: Once tried a frame with black hair on a mission. Noctis did not recognize her.

Title: Rozen's Secret 8
Content: Has a completely messed up sleep schedule. Almost always completely awake.

Title: Rozen's Secret 9
Content: Weaves lies and truth together when talking.

Title: Rozen's Secret 10
Content: Has seriously considered kidnapping Gray Raven's commandant to Cerberus and is looking for the opportunity to do so. The coverup afterward—plans for system file tampering and concealing the truth—has also been prudently prepared.

Title: Rozen's Secret 11
Content: Can only focus on one thing at a time. Will grow annoyed if you hand her more.

Title: Rozen's Secret 12
Content: Has imagined the scenario of Gray Raven's commandant being Cerberus' commandant. Did not tell anyone else about what she actually saw.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 1
Content: Dislikes being roused from sleep. Will be in a bad mood if done so.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 2
Content: Gamer god. Especially good at action games from the Golden Age.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 3
Content: Has no idea about how casual games like matching pairs work. Thinks that they are annoying and have no reason to exist.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 4
Content: Has a near photographic memory about traveling routes and image-related information.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 5
Content: Dislikes repairing and switching frames. Rejects all scheduled frame maintenance events.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 6
Content: Had his taste sensors especially enhanced. Broad-minded about different human delicacies, and is eager to try them.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 7
Content: Begins to doubt himself when his thoughts align with Kamui's.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 8
Content: Only conscious about 30% of the time when he is in Kamui's M.I.N.D. Sleeping in the rest of the 70%. Does not know all that Kamui sees or hears.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 9
Content: After coming to terms with Kamui, for almost every night daily, Kamui will tell him everything that's happened in the day.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 10
Content: Obstinately trusts his instincts and first impressions on people. Scientists like Asimov are of course a den of dangerous bastards, and the commandant of Gray Raven is "eh, alright" and worthy of trust, at least.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 11
Content: To everyone's surprise, Camu keeps his promises and is always punctual.

Title: Crocotta's Secret 12
Content: Will fall silent when he is in deep contemplation. Kamui has once said that an angry Camu is extremely terrifying.

Title: Rigor's Secret 1
Content: Her obsolete centaur module is officially named "Lindwyrm".

Title: Rigor's Secret 2
Content: Forest Guard members groom each other's hair. Rosetta's hairstyle was the result of a public voting.

Title: Rigor's Secret 3
Content: Likes animals, especially whales.

Title: Rigor's Secret 4
Content: Concerned about her frame weight. In weight measurement tests, she will stealthily activate her wings to cheat.

Title: Rigor's Secret 5
Content: Rosetta was once reluctant about being called a leader or captain, but eventually gave in.

Title: Rigor's Secret 6
Content: Not good with electronics and machines. According to Rosetta, however, she definitely knows how to use them, she merely dislikes them.

Title: Rigor's Secret 7
Content: Rosetta still believes that centaurs really existed.

Title: Rigor's Secret 8
Content: Rosetta finds it difficult to adapt to simulated gravity environments. She usually avoids going near portholes that can see the outer space.

Title: Rigor's Secret 9
Content: To be battle-ready at all times, Rosetta sleeps standing and levitating.

Title: Rigor's Secret 10
Content: Babylonia has equipped Rosetta with a spear and a shield according to her usage habits. Rosetta, however, actually has no weapon preferences and can use any weapons effectively for battle.

Title: Rigor's Secret 11
Content: Has childish interests such as dodge ball, card games, watching animations, and so on.

Title: Rigor's Secret 12
Content: After meeting the commandant, Rosetta has been feeling like the unlucky incidents are becoming few and far between.

Title: Pavo's Secret 1
Content: Very rarely calls herself the Kowloong Monarch unless necessary.

Title: Pavo's Secret 2
Content: Enjoys reading human books during her leisure time, particularly on anthropology and history topics.

Title: Pavo's Secret 3
Content: Understands and agrees that propaganda is necessary, but still cringes when she sees her own image being printed on promotional materials.

Title: Pavo's Secret 4
Content: Felt relaxed for a very brief moment after disappearing, but soon denied this emotion. She knew she had to keep working on Tabula Akasha in secret.

Title: Pavo's Secret 5
Content: It's always lonely at the top. But Qu does not mind.

Title: Pavo's Secret 6
Content: Strictly follows her daily routine.

Title: Pavo's Secret 7
Content: Felt taking care of her own long hair was a lot of hassle, so decided to just wear it down.

Title: Pavo's Secret 8
Content: Once thought about asking Huiyu to comb her hair, but gave up in the end.

Title: Pavo's Secret 9
Content: Once blamed herself for a long time after lying on a soft lounge for 3 minutes, then ordered to destroy all soft-texture furniture within KCC.

Title: Pavo's Secret 10
Content: Is an advocate of science, but can be quite traditional when it comes to some personal matters.

Title: Pavo's Secret 11
Content: Found many undiscovered planets on the Observatory, and named them after the people around her.

Title: Pavo's Secret 12
Content: One of them was named after the commandant.

Title: Qilin's Secret 1
Content: Cares a lot about his own good, almost to the extent of being greedy, but knows his boundaries well and will not do the wrong thing for profit. The "profit" here is not limited to monetary terms, as Changyu also sees relationship with others as important asset.

Title: Qilin's Secret 2
Content: Likes to address those older than him as uncle or auntie, but only out of respect. Immediately changes if told not to do so.

Title: Qilin's Secret 3
Content: Hates waste, so he dislikes those tycoons who easily throw things away and tries to avoid dealing with them. Thinks Jamilah is a good merchant as she makes maximum use of her goods.

Title: Qilin's Secret 4
Content: Actually quite bothered by the fact that Constructs can never grow taller again naturally.

Title: Qilin's Secret 5
Content: Can be a little laid-back, but always makes sure his duties are completed.

Title: Qilin's Secret 6
Content: Is a great Kowloong cook and enjoys cooking for others. His dishes taste good, but often look horrible as he cannot be bothered to improve their aesthetics.

Title: Qilin's Secret 7
Content: Has 48 secret bases located in ruins or cabin warehouses. Keeps his "goodies" in these bases to prepare for unforeseen situations.

Title: Qilin's Secret 8
Content: Never easily makes a promise. Always tries to get away or decline the things that he is not willing to do.

Title: Qilin's Secret 9
Content: When he was a kid, he dreamed of becoming a hero in the drama to protect everyone.

Title: Qilin's Secret 10
Content: Is great at playing traditional games like mahjong. Can tell a card by touching its surface pattern, and sort the tiles to his liking using some technique.

Title: Qilin's Secret 11
Content: Apart from playing cards, Changyu has also learned many performing tricks during his leisure time. Often makes good use of these tricks in his missions.

Title: Qilin's Secret 12
Content: Uses his tail mostly for grabbing and maintaining balance, but can also use it as a weapon occasionally. He would make a sudden turn to "accidentally" tangle the opponent's legs with the tail, then attack again when bowing down to apologize. This move rarely misses on the first encounter.

Title: Laurel's Secret 1
Content: Under her sister's influence, she adores wearing stylish trinkets from time to time.

Title: Laurel's Secret 2
Content: Technically, the external attachment to this coating is entirely made of Punishing Virus Heteromers.

Title: Laurel's Secret 3
Content: Luna would rather be attacked than have her body smeared with dirt.

Title: Laurel's Secret 4
Content: Luna enjoys the feeling of weightlessness and near-perfect cleanliness in space.

Title: Laurel's Secret 5
Content: Because of her levitation, Luna's hair is frequently tangled and requires a lot of grooming.

Title: Laurel's Secret 6
Content: Luna has been afraid of hot meals since she was a child. Although Construct is unlikely to get burned, she cannot seem to break her habit of blowing on hot food before eating.

Title: Laurel's Secret 7
Content: She knows very little about the general knowledge because her daily activities are taken care of by her sister or Roland.

Title: Laurel's Secret 8
Content: She likes reading old paper books, although she prefers graphical books with less words.

Title: Laurel's Secret 9
Content: Luna loathes being looked down upon, so she will vary the height of her levitation according on the one she is speaking with.

Title: Laurel's Secret 10
Content: Luna tried to talk to the Corrupted, but they could only follow orders, not answer questions.

Title: Laurel's Secret 11
Content: Luna realized that not all snow is tainted with blood and grime after seeing pristine snow for the first time in the polar area.

Title: Laurel's Secret 12
Content: Lucia made up all sorts of stories about ghosts appearing from the shadows to keep Luna from being alone in the dark. Luna is still terrified of the dark because of this.

Title: 2B's Secret 1
Content: Everything that lives is designed to end. We are perpetually trapped in a never ending spiral of life and death. Is this a curse? Or some kind of punishment? I often think about the god who blessed us with this cryptic puzzle… and wonder if we’ll ever get the chance to kill him.

Title: 2B's Secret 2
Content: How long can I fight amidst this bloody vortex of a battle field? How long, I wonder?

Title: 2B's Secret 3
Content: How long can I continue to protect what I love amidst this endless war? How long, I wonder?

Title: 2B's Secret 4
Content: How long can I continue to believe in a world laden with deceit and folly? How long, I wonder?

Title: 2B's Secret 5
Content: How long can I lie to myself as I despair at the dark future of this world? How long, I wonder?

Title: 9S's Secret 1
Content:
Once, long ago, a volcano erupted. From the fires of the eruption, a god emerged.
One day, the god appeared before the machines and said:
Consciousness, pain, joy, misery...
Fury, shame, desolation, the future...
The meaning of life."

Title: 9S's Secret 2
Content: Each of the machines treated their treasures with great care. One treasured family above all else. Another treasured its older sibling. Another treasured its own beauty. But one more machine treasured something unique above all else…

Title: 9S's Secret 3
Content:
After a long period of battles and adventures, the prophet spoke.
O grant me the mercy of the land!
O grant me the joy of the heavens!
Release me from my yoke of iron!…… Thus shall our souls be saved.
Forever and ever.

Title: 9S's Secret 4
Content:
[TOP SECRET] [Project 02-01 Establishment of the YoRHa Squadron]
Through the dramatic alteration of the Next Generation Combat Unit Project that had been proposed at the time, new "YoRHa" models began to be manufactured.
Officials models were created following the implementation of data acquired from an experimental squadron, and were then deployed to all regions.
Certain members of the YoRHa operations staff, however, were informed of the full scope of the project—these units were tasked to operate and protect the server on the moon.

Title: 9S's Secret 5
Content:
[TOP SECRET] The following materials document the final stages of the YoRHa project.
(Note that this information is classified as Level-SS, meaning that it must not be disclosed to anyone involved in the YoRHa project, including the Commander of the Bunker.)
[Project 03-01 Disposal of YoRHa]
The backdoor of the Bunker has been set to open once the time approaches to switch to new models when enough combat data has been collected.
The Bunker will be disposed of by having it be deliberately attacked by machines.
At this time, all materials regarding the YoRHa project, including this document, will be lost, and falsification of the information that ████████████ will be complete.

Title: A2's Secret 1
Content: Unit from the experimental YoRHa squadron that was programmed to have a neutral personality. Attacker Number 2 took command of the squadron after the death of its original captain, Number 1.

Title: A2's Secret 2
Content: Despite issuing many questionable commands during her initial time in a leadership role, she eventually formed a working relationship with the Resistance and succeeded in destroying the enemy server. While the experimental YoRHa unit Number 2 possessed great growth and adaptability abilities, she also deserted her post following the destruction of the server—and as of this moment, she has yet to be apprehended.

Title: A2's Secret 3
Content: [TOP SECRET] [Project 08-01: Operation of Model No.2 in the YoRHa Project]\nAfter the first descent of the YoRHa prototypes, Attacker 2 (A2) was the sole unit to return alive, despite mediocre results during her simulations. Upon analysis of her stored personality data, it was discovered she possesses excellent analytical and decision-making skills in extreme circumstances.\nAs reported separately, we will install this personality data in the new lot of E models and use them for the security protection of this project.

Title: A2's Secret 4
Content: While the destruction of the server struck a blow against enemy forces, the true purpose of this operator was to monitor and research how the experimental YoRHa models behaved during battle. This information would then be studied and integrated into new YoRHa models once the project were to proceed past the experimental phase. — [Pearl Harbor Descent Summary]

Title: A2's Secret 5
Content: One note of concern: it has been verified that the black box signal of the experimental unit Attacker Number 2 remains live. Due to the possibility of the unit being captured and compromised by the enemy, and due to the unit's existence itself being a matter of the highest level of confidentiality, it has been decided that it is to be recovered—or disposed of—by the Type █ division once that group is fully operational. — [Pearl Harbor Descent Summary]

Title: Hypnos' Secret 1
Content: Really hopes he can sleep 25 hours a day.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 2
Content: Doesn't realize it, but often gets serious during the 1-on-1 training with Chrome. He can't tell how much of it is to tease the poker-faced Captain though.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 3
Content: Somehow, his artificial hair is always curly. No matter how much he tries to comb it, it will go back to the messy curls within a day.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 4
Content: Carries all sorts of random, non-battle-related widgets with him, including but not limited to candies, coins, eye mask, etc.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 5
Content: Wanshi seldom gets into trouble with others, for he can direct the conflict away before it ends up in violence — except when facing Shorthalt from the Scarab Squad.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 6
Content: Wrote "Do not disturb" on the eye mask himself.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 7
Content: Hates to leave the Strike Hawk lounge in winter. Once went to a mission with his own maintenance capsule.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 8
Content: Asked Chrome multiple times for permission to enter hibernation, but was always rejected.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 9
Content: Very good at keeping secrets because failing to do so may make the situation more troublesome.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 10
Content: Which makes Wanshi a very trustworthy friend. People love sharing their stories with him.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 11
Content: Keeps a surstromming can from the Golden Age in his private storage. It has never been opened.

Title: Hypnos' Secret 12
Content: Constructs have great hearing, and it keeps Wanshi from staying asleep. But nothing can wake him up if the commandant is around.

Title: Tempest's Secret 1
Content: Proficient in multiple languages in order to recreate operas in their most classic form.

Title: Tempest's Secret 2
Content: While Ayla and her are both artists, she prefers more classic performance over Ayla's modern style. This often leads to "friendly" arguments.

Title: Tempest's Secret 3
Content: Unlike what most would have imagined, most of those arguments end up with Ayla giving in.

Title: Tempest's Secret 4
Content: Has mastered all classical instruments and can easily replace a symphony orchestra by herself. She's been challenging metal rock recently, and is interested in drums in particular.

Title: Tempest's Secret 5
Content: As an opera singer, Selena has great talent in both music and literature. Often writes sequels for classic works, but keeps them strictly to herself.

Title: Tempest's Secret 6
Content: She's a textbook classic and traditional lady with elegant manners. However, her imagination can be vibrant and wild, and she can easily get lost in thoughts in any occasion.

Title: Tempest's Secret 7
Content: Has a great voice and often likes to hum, but gets very embarrassed if others find her humming or mumbling to herself.

Title: Tempest's Secret 8
Content: Is very sensitive to sound and can tell who is around even with eyes closed. Ayla in particular.

Title: Tempest's Secret 9
Content: Has a habit of writing letters and can write beautiful cursive letters. Keeps a long-time pen pal whose identity is still unknown.

Title: Tempest's Secret 10
Content: Is also a great dancer. Can even master men's lead steps.

Title: Tempest's Secret 11
Content: Is very fond of flowers but doesn't keep them herself, for everything she tries to grow will end up withering.

Title: Tempest's Secret 12
Content: Is considered to be naive in some ways, as she can openly and seriously say extremely embarrassing words while being total unaware of them. In fact, she doesn't think there is any problem at all.

Title: Glory's Secret 1
Content: Has chosen to use a weapon that accommodates the flexibility and mobility of his frame. Such weapons are extremely difficult to use, but he is very good at them.

Title: Glory's Secret 2
Content: Sometimes ignores the outside world when he spends too long lost in thought.

Title: Glory's Secret 3
Content: Has once prepared backup plans all the way from A to N.

Title: Glory's Secret 4
Content: Starts to notice things that are "outside the rules" more than he used to.

Title: Glory's Secret 5
Content: Still subconsciously tries to shoulder all problems and emergencies on himself, but is learning to seek opinions and help from those he can trust.

Title: Glory's Secret 6
Content: The "ear studs" are actually radar-amplifying devices. Was a bit concerned with their design in the beginning, but eventually decided to keep them after someone praised them greatly.

Title: Glory's Secret 7
Content: Has more faith in his team than in others, and prefers to let them grow instead of coaching them. Often worries about Kamui's recklessness, but also understands that Kamui has his reasons and guidelines.

Title: Glory's Secret 8
Content: Is sometimes worried that his preaching may have a negative effect on team members. Once told Kamui about his concern, but only got more baffled after Kamui burst into laughter.

Title: Glory's Secret 9
Content: Apart from reading, he also enjoys other hobbies in leisure time like chess. Unfortunately, nobody in his squad could play with him, so he brought an electronic chess board and knocked on the Gray Raven Commandant's lounge one day after mission.

Title: Glory's Secret 10
Content: Has ever only lost to two people in chess.

Title: Glory's Secret 11
Content: Reads through the comments when browsing books in the database. Out of habit, he would remember those with similar opinions as himself, and pay extra attention to their reading preferences later on.

Title: Glory's Secret 12
Content: Has set a special ringtone for the special comms channel with the commandant of Gray Raven.

Title: XXI's Secret 1
Content: Treats the Co-Bot as a companion and likes to give it surprisingly cute or ridiculous nicknames.

Title: XXI's Secret 2
Content: She's curious and likes to get to the bottom of any matter she doesn't understand. She always asks embarrassing and difficult questions.

Title: XXI's Secret 3
Content: She can't help imitating the people she trusts and learning their way of life. Sometimes, she even learns some peculiar behaviors.

Title: XXI's Secret 4
Content: She doesn't know how to smile, which can only be described as unsettling. After a couple of ill-timed smiles that had adverse effects, she decided that smiling was beyond comprehension, and she has seldom smiled from then on out.

Title: XXI's Secret 5
Content: She's an airhead when it comes to engineering and is incapable of understanding mechanical structures. Machines she tinkers with tend to have a lot of extra parts, but surprisingly most of them work.

Title: XXI's Secret 6
Content: In standby mode, she'll ask others to give her some small missions to kill time. Generally, she's only assigned to menial tasks, not realize she's being fooled.

Title: XXI's Secret 7
Content: She always labels people she cares about with colors and sometimes directly calls others "red man," "blue guy," etc. No one understands her criteria, but she appears to be the only one without a color.

Title: XXI's Secret 8
Content: After unwittingly coming into contact with the audio-visual terminal, she indulges in watching random video clips in her spare time. She has a proclivity for nature documentaries.

Title: XXI's Secret 9
Content: Because of her experience in the lab, she retains the habit of recording data on the condition of her frame all the time, even though it is no longer necessary. At the suggestion of the Gray Raven Commandant, she has started to record things other than battles, such as colors seen, favorite smells... until Vera found a foul-smelling scrapbook in Cerberus's break room.

Title: XXI's Secret 10
Content: The activation date of her frame is unknown due to a loss of data while being recycled by Kurono. The current date was assigned to her by some human.

Title: XXI's Secret 11
Content: The Gray Raven Commandant is the only person authorized to give Buddy nicknames.

Title: XXI's Secret 12
Content: Her distorted perception of her life as an "experiment" is gradually changing with the efforts of the people around her. Recently, it seems that she can take this problem more or less seriously.

Title: Garnet's Secret 1
Content: Vera has tied her hair up after changing into the new frame. Some say she does not want the long hair to obstruct her vision while attacking.

Title: Garnet's Secret 2
Content: Many prefer spears because they can attack from a relatively safe distance, but Vera seems to enjoy charging with hers actively to maximize the destructive power.

Title: Garnet's Secret 3
Content: Knowing that Murray was only the nominal commandant of Cerberus, Vera still tried to investigate his background to find if he had any possible secrets. She found nothing unfortunately.

Title: Garnet's Secret 4
Content: No. 21 seems to think of Vera's banner spear as some sort of "magic prop" that can create a banner out of nowhere. She often asks Vera to show it to her.

Title: Garnet's Secret 5
Content: Vera often utilizes various shady means to get some supplies and parts that are not available through normal sources for No. 21 and Noctis. She seems to think that they do not know about it, but both of them just continue to tacitly play dumb.

Title: Garnet's Secret 6
Content: The strength control of this frame is more difficult to master than others. Even Vera was crushing her mugs when she first changed into it. Strangely, everyone just thought she was doing it on purpose to intimidate them.

Title: Garnet's Secret 7
Content: According to No. 21's observation, at least 36% of Construct soldiers believed Vera "no longer looks as intimidating as before" after changing into her new frame.

Title: Garnet's Secret 8
Content: Vera likes to keep the most troublesome tasks to the end. Similarly, she keeps the most difficult enemies to enjoy last.

Title: Garnet's Secret 9
Content: Vera used to greet those who dared to seek trouble with violence. After warned by Nikola multiple times, she now prefers to destroy their ego with words first, and takes joy from their humiliated, furious faces.

Title: Garnet's Secret 10
Content: Vera mentions that she has yet to master the banner spear completely, and therefore has included more flexible kicks to complement her moves. In fact, they have raised both the practicality and aesthetics of this weapon to another level.

Title: Garnet's Secret 11
Content: Vera sometimes goes to watch the stage plays performed by WGAA, but only quietly stays in an alienated corner until the end. She would disappear before the audience finishes their cheering and applause.

Title: Garnet's Secret 12
Content: Vera never asked, but No. 21 and Noctis often brought back news about the Gray Raven Commandant, possibly because their captain "seemed to be interested."
